page.title: 07The Gas Pipeline, New Deer
page.content: Beneath the fields of our neighbouhood there runs a{1metre {diameter pipeline}carrying{natural gas from{St.Fergus Gas Terminal}to {Grangemouth,}well over 100 miles away. During the construction of the pipeline a great deal of local interest was shown in the activities of the large{self-propelled machines {that dug the trench, lifted and moved {the pipes and serviced the welders. There was even a most impressive self propelled{machine for bending the {1metre diameter pipes! All the{land was restored}to its former use and all that shows is a series of marker posts where the pipeline crosses roads and also the {valve station at Auchmaliddie,}which is maintained in a very tidy condition by the gas board.
